snippet.title: The Drifter - Reveal
snippet.description:
Announcing The Drifter, our upcoming Pulp Adventure Thriller!
Website - http://thedriftergame.com
Wishlist now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1170570/The_Drifter/

A drifter, murdered, finds himself alive again seconds before his death. Struggling to maintain his sanity, can he unravel the conspiracy surrounding his condition and those hunting him?
